title: 4.CSY.1
text: The student will model how a computing system works to accomplish a task.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Describe how computing systems perceive the world through sensors and other inputs.
Compare and contrast how humans and computers process information from inputs.
Explain how computing devices may be used to classify and organize input.
Diagram and describe a simple computing system indicating processors, inputs, and outputs.
